Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: There has been a bit of mix up... actually https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/7119/ (attached to FAB-2081 but should really have been attached to this JIRA) fixes this JIRA. FAB-2081 is meant for fixing the security aspects of this. Closing this as done and continuing the discussion in 2081.
